snippet: The backlog in the disability compensation system at the Veterans Benefits Administration has prompted some workers to go public about the dysfunction within their own bureaucracy.
abstract: Workers at the Veterans Benefits Administration's regional office in Columbia, SC, will picket outside their workplace, hoping to draw attention to the lack of accountability in the system, its inadequate resources, complex policies and demoralizing work conditions; the workers have been prompted to act by the growing backlog in the disability compensation system.
lead_paragraph: The backlog in the disability compensation system at the Veterans Benefits Administration has prompted some workers to go public about the dysfunction within their own bureaucracy.

headline.main: Workers Point Finger at Their Own Agency Amid a Backlog in Veterans’ Benefits
headline.print_headline: Workers Point Finger at Their Own Agency Amid a Backlog in Veterans’ Benefits
